name: The Dark Stone from Mebara
description: Set in 1924 Massachusetts, take the role of Detective Monroe, Professor Webley, and Boss Pendleton of the Pendleton Agency, all of whom have come to possess an eerie black rock with strange properties.
minimum_requirements: Минимальные: ОС: Windows XP/Vista/7 Процессор: Pentium 4 2.0ghz or higher Оперативная память: 512 MB ОЗУ

reviews.review_text: This is an interesting game from a certain point of view. I enjoyed playing it, does have a special graphic and great game mechanics, the overall sound is good. Keeps you entertained and satisfied.
Has an option to 'reduce flickering,' which does absolutely nothing to reduce the insane stobe light flickering. Unplayable.
